Articles.Content: When a planet or star is far enough away that they are too small to see the game will unload its mesh and everything attached which can include clouds, I would like it if someone made a plugin that could prevent specific celestial bodies from unloading (For reasons i cant say now cuz it would get somebody hyped)
you can actually see the bodies from very far distances, look at the telescope mods.
Yeah but thats because they are loaded in when the telescope zooms in, And whenever i've done that scaledspace would glitch

> 
> Yeah but thats because they are loaded in when the telescope zooms in, And whenever i've done that scaledspace would glitch

So what do you mean by seeing it from a distance? It will still be a tiny pixel from a far distance.

> 
> So what do you mean by seeing it from a distance? It will still be a tiny pixel from a far distance.

Anything attached to the planet will unload with the mesh so if i used EVE to make a massive cloud surrounding the solar system that wouldnt be possible because the suns mesh unloads at about kerbins distance and the flare takes over for it, But if the suns mesh never unloads then i can make a massive planetary nebula or in the case of starsystems an eliptical galaxy

Celestial bodies never unload, regardless of location. The reason you cannot see planets beyond Kerbin is because they appear less than a pixel wide. Having clouds attached to them should work no matter what.
